sentences.sContent: Jim made a vow that he would find his wife’s killer.
sentences.sCn: 吉姆发誓要找到杀害他妻子的凶手。

sentences.sContent: While many models vow to go back to college, few do.
sentences.sCn: 很多模特儿发誓要重返大学，但几乎无人做到。

sentences.sContent: I solemnly vowed that someday I would return to live in Europe.
sentences.sCn: 我郑重起誓总有一天我要重回欧洲生活。

trans.tranOther: If you vow to do something, you make a serious promise or decision that you will do it
